name: character-app
description: A smarter mobile tabel-top character sheet

scripts.js: time browserify -d src/ui/index.js -o build/bundle.js -x classnames -x d3 -x debug -x fastclick -x firebase -x immutable -x moment -x node-uuid -x page -x react -x react-dom -x swiper -x url-pattern
scripts.js-min: npm run js && uglifyjs build/bundle.js -o build/bundle.js --compress --mangle
scripts.js-prod: npm run js-vendor-prod && npm run js-min
scripts.js-vendor: time browserify -r classnames -r d3 -r debug -r fastclick -r firebase -r immutable -r moment -r node-uuid -r page -r react -r react-dom -r swiper -r url-pattern -o build/vendor.js
scripts.js-vendor-prod: npm run js-vendor && uglifyjs build/vendor.js -o build/vendor.js --compress --mangle
scripts.watch-js: watchify -d src/ui/index.js -o build/bundle.js -v -x classnames -x d3 -x debug -x fastclick -x firebase -x immutable -x moment -x node-uuid -x page -x react -x react-dom -x swiper -x url-pattern
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run statics && npm run css && npm run js-vendor && npm run js
scripts.build-prod: npm run clean && npm run statics && npm run css-min && npm run js-prod
scripts.build-deploy: npm run build-prod && npm run deploy
